!Antique Dealer Patrin: It has come to my attention that the Orc seer Reva of Aden Castle Town is collecting Ancient Ash Urns. I asked him to give them to me so that I could sell them for a handsome price to antique collectors. He refused my offer, insisting that he needed them for a ritual! He promised me that if he finds an urn that does not contain any remains he would send it to me. Have you brought me such an item? [Quest _371_ShriekOfGhosts 30929-01a.htm|"Tell me about the appraisal."] [Quest _371_ShriekOfGhosts 30929-TRADE|"Please appraise the urn."]
